name: Unilateral Table Tennis
description: A Breakout or Pong inspired game in which the player controls a paddle trying to break through a layer of blocks on the top of the screen.

name: Snake
description: A Snake game. Usually only appears in models with four directional buttons. In which the player tries to obtain the randomly placed "fruit" in the playfield without touching a wall or themselves. Rather then continually get longer like you would in Snake, however, the player stops growing after eating only 13 fruits, causing the snake to restart to beginning size, and creating another maze of obstacles. This in turn makes it more of a game of endurance rather then strategy.

name: Car Racing Game
description: The player switches between lanes to avoid other cars and obstacles passing through. The player loses if the car hits one of them. Some versions have the speed/level increase gradually over time. A less common variant allows the car to freely move instead of switching lanes and the speed automatically set to maximum number (with the option to slow down using the down button). It is typically featured as a first or second game (on either "A" or B" on letter-based selection, and "1" or "2" on older numbered selection).

name: Frogger
description: An adaptation of the arcade game Frogger. The player controls a flashing dot (the "frog") and has to cross the lines without touching any moving tiles throughout the level. A level is completed when the player successfully crosses the lines 5 or 10 times. In some models the game is called "Frog Across River", further referencing its origin. Also appear reverse visible the lines and tiles.

name: Tank Game
description: A tank game similar to Battle City, usually released in Brick Games. The player's goal is to shoot down as many enemy tanks as possible to obtain a high score. But with each level often feature "boss battle" in the end where the player would face off a large tank. Some versions omit the boss level and increases the level instantly after the target number has been achieved. The player's tank can easily be identified with a single block (sometimes flashing) on the back which the enemy tanks don't have.

name: Saipped Pursuit
description: Saipped Pursuit is an exciting local multiplayer naval game designed for 2 players. In this game, speed is your ally, but you don't have the option to brake! Choose from a variety of characters and ships, each with their own characteristics, and navigate the screen as you fight to maintain control of your vessel.

name: Suroi
description: Suroi is an open-source 2D battle royale game inspired by surviv.io. Find gear, weapons, and health supplies and become the last standing!

name: Heart Of Nadia
description: Heart Of Nadia - visual novel in the otome genre featuring a choice of three love interests with unique story development.

name: Plug It In
description:
PLUG IT IN is a relaxing and juicy puzzle (simulator) game about electrical plugs connecting to their corresponding outlets.

It works just like in real life! If a plug is long and/or fat then it will block other outlets underneath it. Strategically position your plugs so they all fit in an available outlet!

name: Shepherd's Eye
description: Everyone has secrets at Found Sheep Farm, but it’s so much easier to pretend no one does! Will you pull the wool over your eyes, or will your pursuit of the truth make you the black sheep in this thrilling horror visual novel?

name: Doppelscape
description: Sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder with hex-based tactics. You are trapped in a simulation. Build team wide synergies and use clever positioning to defeat enemies and escape from Doppelscape.

name: Last Week of a King
description: Enter Last Week of a King and follow Jesus as he confronts money lenders in the temple courts and eats Passover with his disciples.

name: En-Fem-E No. 9: The Factory
description: En-Fem-E No. 9 - The Factory picks up where Reborn left off. You are pitted against an evil corporation that has malevolent intent and they want you to be apart of their plan.

name: Moe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokemon Penumbra Moon
description:
Pokémon Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon are mods for Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon. Like my Rutile Ruby & Star Sapphire hacks and my Nova Sun & Umbra Moon hacks, their main purpose is to provide a more challenging game experience while not artificially limiting the player. The premier feature of Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon is the ground-up redesign of Pokémon Trainers in the world to increase the game’s challenge. Every trainer in the game has been edited, and the level curve expects use of the Experience Share, which means that the player levels up very quickly. Every Pokémon in Trainers’ teams has a a proper moveset and many are holding items. The Elite Four and Champion are Level 100, and the player doesn’t need to grind to equal that!

Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon’s secondary focus is inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee’s “20XX Hack Pack” which is designed to improve competitive players’ ability to practice and grind. In Supernova Sun and Penumbra Moon’s Legit Build, everything obtainable is 100% legal and legitimate for real online battles or trades. In all Builds, some features are designed to make preparing competitive teams much less of a hassle. Competitive hold items are much more available, a 6IV Ditto is available through an in-game trade (holding a Destiny Knot), Eggs hatch in one cycle, and Level 100 Memento Blissey battles are available in the Battle Buffet once the main story has been beaten.​

name: Fortune Avenue
description: Experience the excitement of Fortune Avenue, a 3D monopoly game reimagined. Travel via airport, avoid melting ice floes, and spin the Wheel of Fortune. Vote on new game-changing rules and eliminate opponents for bonuses. Fast-paced, and endlessly fun!

name: The Last of Us Part III
description: The rumoured sequel of the critically acclaimed game, The Last Of Us.

name: Forever Blue Luminous
description: Sin descripción

name: Poly Beats
description: Poly Beats is a 5K rhythm game that never misses to have the very best features, and interesting gimmicks.

name: MikoVerse
description: Explore user-generated worlds, join communities, socialize, build and play together in this visually stunning sandbox game.

name: Popper
description: Popper is a Bomberman clone for the Timetop GameKing.
2004 is a shoot em up for the Timetop GameKing. The game is a sequel to 2003.

name: Supermotor
description: Supermotor is a racing game for the Timetop GameKing.

name: Dino Adventure Legend
description: Dino Adventure Legend is a 2D platformer released for the TimeTop Gameking.

name: Street Hero
description: Street Hero is a beat 'em up released on the Timetop GameKing in 2003.

name: Mitt Babyzoo
description: Sin descripción

name: Blind Ranking Game
description: Rank the current item without knowing what the next one is! A web based game for streamers and youtubers to play alongside their audiences. Bring tons of fun and engagement

name: Churro Maniacs
description: A cooking simulator of churros! Serve strange customers! Some of them with normal preferences..? others kinda creep!

name: Poly Impulse
description: Poly Impulse is a fast-paced FPS platform game where you will have to shoot colorful polyhedrons to impulse yourself through the level. Speedrunning is not an option, only the fastest with godlike aim will get the SS rank.

name: Schwarzerblitz: 8-Colors Star Guardians Collaboration Costumes - Chapter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fa Jin
description: Cyberpunk and Chinese folklore collide in Fa Jin, an open-world, ARPG set in futuristic Shanghai. Navigate the cityscape as you uncover plots that fester in the dark underbelly of the city. Will you thwart the plots that threaten the city, or become entangled in its web of deception?

name: Mario Starcatcher 2
description: A flash game where each small level has Mario working his way to reach the star at the end.

name: The Penjikent Creature
description: The Penjikent Creature is a terrifying, short horror experience inspired by the real-life Penjikent Murals in Tajikistan.

name: Asterisk no Daibouken
description:
One of the only games successfully dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette. This was a student game project developed in the HAL College of Technology & Design (no relation to HAL Laboratory).

This game was dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette in 2005 by d4s. It was originally thought that the data was deteriorating but I am starting to believe it wasn't aside from a few bits.

The goal of the game is to take the coin at the end of the level, then go back and defeat the boss by hitting it 5 times with either the sword or the fireball, then the credits would appear.

name: Hebereke no Pair Pair Wars
description: An unreleased puzzle game developed by SNK for the Neo Geo. Why it got cancelled is unknown.

name: Alien Reign
description: Alien Reign is a cancelled sci-fi real time strategy game in development by SquareSoft USA (Redmond) in late 1995 / early 1996. While the project was still in early concept phase when it was canned and no console was decided yet, by looking at the partnership between Squaresoft and Sony in 1996 we can speculate that if only completed Alien Reign could have been released on the original Playstation, and maybe on PC.

name: Khan Academy Kids: Learning!
description: Khan Academy Kids makes learning fun with thousands of educational games, books, and activities that inspire a lifetime of learning and discovery for children ages 2-8.

name: I Wanna Save the Kids!
description:
I Wanna Save the Kids (also known as IWSTK) is a freeware indie video game published by Mike "Kayin" O'Reilly, its creator, in late 2007 worldwide on his official website. It is the prequel to I Wanna Be the Guy (despite being released after it) and therefore chronologically the first game in the I Wanna Be the Guy series.

The game's mechanics are inspired by the game Lemmings: The Kid must manage to save some children, who advance regardless of the dangers, and bring them to a safe place in a kind of house. To do this he has several tools at his disposal, but most of the time he is forced to obtain these tools by overcoming IWBTG-worthy maps, complete with spikes, falling cherries and more.

name: Kemoverse Online
description: Kemoverse Online is an online socializing game where you live your life as a Kemonae, in the world of the Kemoverse - a worldbuilding project set in a post-apocalyptic furry world.

name: Saints Row: Money Shot
description: Saints Row: Money Shot is a cancelled game in the Saints Row series, intended to take place between Saints Row 2 and Saints Row: The Third.

name: Diamond
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Diamond.

name: Sky Dreamer
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Sky Dreamer.

name: Exist
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Exist.

name: Trooper
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Trooper.

name: Final Man
description: VT03 port of Final Man.

name: Mad Xmas
description: VT03 port of Mad Xmas.

name: Corridor
description: Original VT02 version of Corridor.

name: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kinsenka Kyou Ezara Satsujin Jiken
description: Japanese adventure murder mystery visual novel. Published 1992 on Turbografx CD in Japan.

name: Idosra: The Electric Renaissance
description: Explore the distant future in Idosra, an action-adventure RPG set in a world on the verge of rediscovering electricity. Follow Marika's quest to uncover the motives of the Vallas Empire. Learn dozens of new skills, meet a wide cast of characters, and discover the secrets of the lost city Idosra.

name: Trucker Joe 2
description: As a trucker, you take control of your own freight company, buying trucks, expanding your fleet and transporting goods across fantastic landscapes. Overcome challenges, upgrade your vehicles and experience the thrill of the trucking business.

name: Remember Us
description: "Remember Us" is an emotional adventure game where you witness the final moments of Dean, an Alzheimer's patient, as he tries to remember his beloved wife Marta and his past before passing away. Find objects, revive memories, and discover Dean's poignant farewell moment.

name: Mouse Clicker
description: Mouse Clicker, you can spam to whatever you want. You can use it as macro. You can set cordinatte to function. Also u can set key and function easily. That tool is helping for gamers.

name: Tank Defence
description: Tank Defense - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a tank with the mouse and the movement of a soldier with the keyboard. The game is designed for two players who work together to resist hordes of enemies and help each other pass levels.

name: A Weekend Trip
description: A point-and-click adventure about a trip with friends over the weekend. Help your friends, explore the place, hang around or just enjoy the scenery. Decide what River does during this trip.

name: Fogreach: Shadow Whisperers
description: Fogreach: Shadow Whisperers plunges you into a mysterious mountain town veiled in perpetual fog. As investigator Sarah, decipher puzzles, confront psychological horrors, and shape your destiny through critical choices. Confront the unknown, shatter the curse, and unveil secrets hidden in shadows.

name: Panzer Rollen
description: Panzer Rollen is a WW2 tank game. In the formal version, you fight in historically reconstructed Japanese castles. You can learn Samurai's defense doctrine "Yokoya-o-kakeru" (横矢をかける）, which means making a flank attack on the enemy.

name: AI Stories: Machine Angel
description: Will you help a serving, chocolate loving and card playing daemon? Will you dance with a gardening space game playing worm? Will you Repair all 50 robots and bring back 600 Machine Bacteria in this first person parkour movement shooter and become The Angel of Mars?

name: Ephemeral Descent
description: Etherium Decent plays in a abandoned hospital where the army conducted experiments. This Is My First Game That I Developed Myself. As the sole developer, I would be very happy to receive your criticism in order to keep improving.

name: 1114: Robin Hood Survivors
description: Help Robin Hood and his Merry Men to defeat Bad King John in a bullet heaven pixel adventure. 1114:Robin Hood Survivors is a casual, rogue-lite, top-down game where your choices are extremely important. Fight hundreds of forest enemies on screen at once.

name: The Reason for Your Smile
description: A visual novel telling the story of Shun Kousaka, a college student starting into a new chapter of his life. Experience and decide his journey through the perils of love as you work towards achieving his biggest dream: Getting a girlfriend!

name: Strong Fortress
description: This is a Star Wars-themed shooter where the player takes on the role of the protagonist as he pilots a mech to guard a fortress, while managing resources and building a business to take on a battle against alien creatures as the level rounds progress.

name: Hypnosis Mic: Alternative Rap Battle 2nd Period
description: A Hypnosis Mic game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Hypnosis Mic: Alternative Rap Battle 1st Period
description: A Hypnosis Mic game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Hakuoki Ibun: Berezinskii no Majo
description: A Hakuoki game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Kylie Minogue: Breathe (1998).mp3
description: Game sounds brain dump

name: Incolatus: Don't Stop, Girlypop!
description: Spread the love! Incolatus is a Y2K girly-pop arena-style movement shooter where standing still is not an option. The faster you go, the more damage you deal and the more you heal! Just. Don’t. Stop. Moving.

name: MD Card Game 2
description: An SD card with 10 games from Tec Toy for the MD Play Handheld.

name: MD Card Game 1
description: An SD card with 10 games from Tec Toy for the MD Play Handheld.

name: The Incredible Shrinking Character
description: An cancelled action-adventure game that was developed by Go-Go Interactive Studios and Cyberdreams studios, taking inspiration the novel/film The Incredible Shrinking Man, and is set in a universe reminiscent of 1950's science-fiction and horror movies. The player would have controlled a private investigator looking for a wealthy young woman named Julia Caldwell, who vanished after visiting the castle of a mad scientist named Dr. Warren Franklin, who would use a shrinking ray on the hero. The gameplay would have had the hero venturing through Dr. Franklin's castle, fighting dangers such as animals and heights along the way, of which grow smaller and smaller after each level.

name: Minicars: Road to the city!
description: Experience an amazing adventure as a minicar driver. Deliver goods over difficult and dangerous terrain. Build your fleet, develop your infrastructure, make important decisions and fulfill your dreams in this realistic and addictive game.

name: Kadie's Uncanny Valley
description: Time stands still in Kadie's Uncanny Valley. Deep below the surface lies a failed invention. Her name is Kadie, said to be the first truly life-like doll. Use every aspect of the environment to your survival, avoid what’s hiding in the shadows, and find out for yourself how truly life-like Kadie is

name: Enci's Solution
description: “Enci’s Solution” tells the story of Ji’we who leaves his home behind to go on a journey to the surface of planet Regalia. Living underground his whole life- with the help of Enci and other characters he meets on his way, Ji’we uncovers challenges in a world governed by an AI.

name: Project Windfall
description: Project Windfall is a open-world, third-person, anime-styled, action RPG where you follow the story of Lyare van Windfall - a charismatic, adventurous, young woman & the sole heir of house Windfall.

name: Dream Runner
description: Collect memory shards, get away from monsters and survive until you have nowhere to run anymore! Dream Runner is a Platformer Runner Survivor casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly change your strategy for the better or worst.

name: Island Rise
description: "Island Rise" is a captivating survival and adventure game where players build their own island, uncover its mysteries, and engage in gathering, farming, crafting, dungeon exploration, and epic boss battles. Stranded on a mysterious island, you must navigate its secrets and challenges to thrive.

name: Jack and Bursh
description: Jack and Bursh is a Roguelike challenge game that combines magic, action, and shooting elements. Players will play various characters with abilities and constantly challenge their limits in a different world!

name: Strange Hunting Grounds
description: A casual hack and slash game that conquers hell by creating a powerful expedition through a variety of skill & weapon combinations

name: Cyrus The Virus
description: You play as Cyrus, a notorious pirate, skilled in stealth and cunning. The game emphasizes non-lethal takedowns and strategic gameplay, where players must navigate through environments using shadows, distractions, and environmental elements to their advantage.

name: Greedshot
description: Greedshot is a first-person rogue-lite shooter with procedurally generated locations. Play alone or with friends in co-op mode, facing merciless enemies and environments

name: Superstore Simulator
description: Develop your store, order goods, and sell, sell, sell. Hire employees and take care of customers. Enjoy a rather humorous approach to trading and running a store where you can look forward to hours upon hours of great entertainment.

name: Voidsayer
description: The world has fallen into darkness, cursed by the Abyss. You are one of the many hapless survivors at risk of being consumed. Unlike others, you have a chance to fight back. Voidsayer is a dark monster tamer jRPG. Assemble your monster team, take on eldritch horrors, and return hope to the world.

name: The August Before
description: The August Before is a meditative narrative 3D puzzle about cleaning up, sorting out and packing up your life before moving on. Clean up and don’t forget your old belongings on your way to the new life!

name: Defenders
description: You thought you landed alone. You were wrong. Now you must defend yourself against waves of enemies in order to survive. Vanquish thousands of foes, master your abilities, call in reinforcements, and survive in a quest to become a true Defender.

name: Stardustry
description: You are the new manager of Stardustry, the pinnacle of resource extraction and production in outer space! Mine ores, process them and create complex resources in this chill industry simulator set in space.

name: Aurorae
description: Aurorae adopts the art form of combination of anime drawing and cartoon characters. The game adopts a horizontal combat mode, combined with a very rich and diverse character skill design.

name: Lost Dungeon
description: Lost Dungeon is a dungeon exploration game with randomly generated elements, by collecting treasures, matching equipment, to defeat the evil creatures that occupy the depths of the dungeon.

name: Legends of the Round Table
description: Lead the Knights of the Round Table through King Arthur's legend in a unique RPG, full of honor, magic and romance. Plunge into a colorful world inspired by medieval art, tales and music. Undertake perilous quests and fiercely defend your kingdom to make the flower of chivalry blossom again.

name: Plague Doctor
description: Plague Doctor is a Gritty, Dark and Gory replication of the Medieval Black Plague. You play as a somewhat anti-villain, a plague doctor. Immerse yourself like never before in an open world Medieval Kingdom - Riddled with the plague.

name: Galaxy Raiders
description: Galaxy Raiders - 2D Adventure game, where you find yourself in the role of a spaceship captain, you have to travel to different parts of the galaxy, completing missions. Your ship is equipped with various weapons that will help you cope with enemy attacks and destroy opponents.

name: Jungle Bloody Operation
description: Jungle: Bloody Operation is a top-down TDS shooter where you have to shoot from many waves of dangerous creatures! Your character, Jake, finds himself in the thick of the wild, separated from his squad. Now he has to survive in this gloomy and hostile environment.

name: Magic Duck
description: Magic Duck is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements, where you will take on the role of an amazing magical duck with a magic hat that has amazing magical powers. An exciting adventure awaits you in which you will fight against fire dragons and other magical creatures.

name: Warfare Legacy Collection
description: Warfare 1917 and Warfare 1944, updated for modern hardware, join forces in Warfare Legacy Collection. Experience the intense tug-of-war of WW1 and WW2 and engage in strategic battles that defined an era. Command waves of troops, unleash tactical prowess, and even customize your own battlefields!

name: Traveler's Refrain
description: Wield your magical instrument and defy the mecha-goddesses of fate in this Song-Casting Story Driven Action-RPG. Explore a forbidden forest as Traveler, and help him reunite with his long lost love as you fight through abominations and solve mysterious puzzles, all while an ancient conflict unfolds.

name: Scape
description: Escape insurmountable debt in a haunted asylum. Solve puzzles, confront vengeful spirits, and survive the chilling unknown. Can you make it out?

name: Telf AG
description: The strategy of Telf AG is based on the process of mining, processing and exporting nickel. The tests are hidden in logical mini-games, victory in which brings profit. The goal of the player is to establish production, build supply logistics and obtain an economic effect.

name: Fighting breakthrough
description: Fighting breakthrough is a 2D platformer, where you take on the role of a soldier who must fight his way through enemy forces and complete his mission. Exciting levels filled with shooting, dynamic battles and intense combat missions await you.

name: Realms of Arcana
description: Realms of Arcana is an engaging RPG set in a mysterious world shaped by the legacy of a fallen empire, featuring deep exploration, crafting, strategic combat with melee, magic, stealth, and a storyline where every choice impacts the game's rich narrative.

name: Flooftopia
description: Flooftopia is a non-combat-based MMORPG set in a fantasy world filled with adorable Floofs. Shape your adventure by level up skills, professions, taking on bosses, customizing houses, and join other players and make a village. There's always something to explore in the world of Flooftopia!

name: Life Code
description: A semi openworld Third Person - Action Adventure Cyberpunk/Post Apocalyptic style story game. You can use multiple weapons, attachments, vehicles, close combat skills and bullet time to break through your enemies.

name: ReMove
description: ReMove is a sokoban puzzle game about moving and giving up your movement to escape an experiment laboratory

name: No Surrender Heroes
description: No Surrender Heroes is a real-time epic battle game set in the No Surrender Universe.

name: Hyperspace Deck Command
description: Hyperspace Deck Command is a sci-fi card-battler roguelite. Deploy spaceships that operate on individual turn timers, combine a wide variety of cards into powerful decks and use dual-use status effects to defeat the hegemonising swarm intelligence.

name: Easy puzzle: Streets
description: Is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture

name: Pigeon's Mission
description: Enjoy a whimsical pixel-art adventure crafted from a 6-year-old's art & vision. Navigate Pepper Pines as Archie, a pigeon with clever attacks & CRAZY power-ups, on a dangerous quest to save his parents. Experience a blend of nostalgia & fresh, fun gameplay in a world ruled by imagination & wonder.

name: Fire and Rescue
description: Fires have broken out all over the city! Use your portable water tank to extinguish raging fires and carry innocent civilians to safety. Play by yourself or simultaneously with a friend to see who is the best fire-fighter in FIRE AND RESCUE!

name: UntilZombieDown
description: "Until Zombies Down" is a top-down roughlike shooting game.Eliminate zombies in different environments and locations.Whether day and night or blizzards and sandstorms.Upgrade yourself in action,buy items to improve your system.Complete the goal and come back alive to earn rewards.

name: Survivaluck
description: Survivaluck is a low-poly survival, where you can bend your luck. Discover rare loot, collect resources & craft better gear to break free from the Curse.

name: HamSumo
description: BONK YOUR FRIENDS in this action-packed, roly-poly, multiplayer action game! Choose your favorite hamster to duke it out with your friends in the most adorable (and explosive!) PvP arena! Unleash unique and powerful Star Moves to blast away the competition!

name: Infinite Chump
description: A surreal, mutated roguelike where you are a chump, infinitely.

name: Gun Gladiator
description: Brutally defeat your enemies, upgrade your equipment, influence the crowd, master the arena and become the new champion in a gory and fast-paced retro FPS set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Sync Your Mind
description: Immerse in rhythm's embrace with Sync Your Mind. A 3D musical odyssey where beats and creativity collide. Conquer rhythmic realms or compose your own. Sync up, rise up, and let the harmonies of your mind unfold! 🚀 #SyncYourMind #RhythmGaming

name: Into The Depths
description: A classic grid & turn-based roguelike, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, aimed at re-creating the games of yesteryear.

name: The Last Rose
description: Kuri Rose was dead, until she wasn't. Now she stands in defiance to a world that is slowly disappearing in this apocalypse adventure visual novel.

name: SCP
description: Explore, craft, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world where SCP anomalies roam freely. Brace yourself for nightly assaults as SCP-049's twisted creations close in.

name: Era of Darkness
description: Era of Darkness is a dungeon exploration RPG that organizes parties to explore dungeons, collects loot and upgrades facilities and party.

name: Eternal Reckoning
description: Eternal Reckoning is an action-packed Metroidvania following the story of an elf taking their revenge for the atrocities of Ragnarok. Slay a wide range of dangerous bosses! Explore a world full of secrets and rich mythology-inspired lore!

name: Away from the light
description: You find yourself in a critical situation on the brink of departure, without awareness indicating whether you have departed from the world of the living. In this surreal and mysterious dimension, your actions dictate the fate of this event, whether it's the end or a new beginning.

name: Save the Villainess
description: What if you woke up as a villainess in a romance novel where someone wants you dead? Guide your villainess by solving mysteries and making choices that lead you closer to romance, revenge… or death. In this mystery/horror otome isekai game, can you Save the Villainess?

name: Full-Scale Invasion
description: Full-Scale Invasion is an armchair general RTS that puts the player directly in the battle as they command ground-to-space armies from the bridge of their very own capital ship.

name: Feeling Death
description: A Game Where You're Killed for Becoming a Couple.

name: Legend of the Nine Colored Deer
description: "Legend of the Nine-Colored Deer" is an adventurous third-person puzzle game filled with Chinese mythology. Seeking the trail of the Nine-Colored Deer, solving puzzles, and unraveling the legend's mysteries. Explore a charming and fantastical world of adventure.

name: Master Builder Simulator
description: Dive into virtual brick-building with Master Builder Simulator! Explore solo or with friends in Sandbox, Model Building, Co-op, or versus modes. Unleash your inner Master Builder in endless creative adventures!

name: Plants in Rush
description: Plants in rush is a multiplayer and single player game. Its fun, fast paced, and simple. You have to chose between 4 fruits throw projectiles spawn lasers turrets and more! it has 3 modes deathmatch team deathmatch and soccer!

name: Dwarfs Delight
description: Join the adventure of Dwarfs Delight, an explosive multiplayer game where dwarves battle in a tavern for glory and beer! Face off against your friends in this couch game, where every mug counts. Get ready for laughter and unforgettable moments. Ideal for nights with friends!

name: Palm Sugar: A Village Story
description: Embark on a pixel RPG journey in 'పల్లెటూరు - PalmSugar.' Battle drug lords, wield unique weapons, and immerse yourself in South Indian culture. Telugu & English localization. Will you save the village?

name: Elhosea
description: Experience 'Elhosea,' a psychological horror walking simulator. As Father Immanuel navigates eerie streets, unravels tragic orphanage secrets, and confronts moral dilemmas. Survive haunting nightmares in this visceral journey through psychological terror.

name: Where Is George
description: George is a sneaky little cat that loves to hide. Can you find him? In this free to play game you need to find 100 cats in beautiful hand drawn levels. Are you able to find them all?

name: West Town Defense
description: Gunslingers and bandits are storming the town! You must stop the crimes and rescue the town! This is a tough mission Sheriff, be careful. A classic, wave based survival game.

name: Win or Crash!
description: Win or Crash! is a heart-pumping racing game that will push your driving skills to the limit.

name: Windah Horror Adventure 2
description: Join Windah Basudara and Jaya Esport friends in this challenging rage game. Each character boasts unique skills. Confront Indonesian Ghosts as epic bosses. Get ready for intense battles and unmatched horror!

name: Wild Gunslinger
description: is a strategy game, a mixture of clicker and Western-style idle. You and your settlers need to swiftly establish a settlement, provide the front with necessary resources, and manage the economy of your city...

name: Wildlife Rescue Simulator
description: Get to the chopper and fly to isolated places to rescue terrified animals from man made disasters. Take photos of your adventures and share it with your loyal supporters to get donations. Upgrade your equipment in order to rescue even more animals.

name: Wildsong

name: Forged in Epic

name: Nine Card Isle

Travel the underworld as an undead superstar athlete, battle monster hockey teams, find new gear and abilities, and take on an evil sports agent demigod!

name: Immortalis
description: Immortalis is a roguelike game that focus on the exhausting side of Dracula's immortality. Every time he dies, he needs to cross the underworld to return. Is immortality a blessing or a burden? Time to find out.

name: Scrap Metal Heroes Rebuilt
description: Scrap Metal Heroes Rebuilt is a real-time strategy game where you can customize a set of 4 robots with over 300 parts and fight them against an AI opponent or other players.

name: M.O.Z.I.
description: M.O.Z.I. - A post-apocalyptic FPS with elements of horror and tower defense. Deadly Wasteland, Dying Planet: radiation, mutants, aliens and savages are all out to get you. Defend yourself, gather food and resources, and upgrade your equipment. Survive.

name: Combasters
description: Combasters is an intense strategy game with elements of tower defense, Combasters are masters who will help you combine elements to win.

name: Sea of Radiation
description: In this crisis-ridden, nuclear-polluted sea, all creatures are slowly mutating. You will play as an ordinary fish, in the nuclear contaminated sea accumulated radiation mutation, attack and devour is the only way you grow, defeat other monsters, and ultimately become the only overlord of this ocean.

name: Kami: Parade of Senses
description: The parade of senses begins and you are forced to become its participant. So make the most of the situation! Explore the Kami Space, help to other forced, who have been trapped here, look for answers to questions, betray, kill... or spare and protect.

name: Fishing Universe
description: Fishing Universe is an engine building incremental game about collecting fish. Place down a plethora of different unit types ranging from simple spearman to extraterrestrial fish harvesters in order to maximize your FPS (fish per second).

name: Cursed Diamonds
description: Cursed Diamonds is a small experimental mystery visual novel using AI. No more limited options and canned answers: you decide what questions to ask, using either text or voice. Grill the suspects, research the case and examine the crime scene, to solve the mystery and find the culprit.

name: Wonderia
description: Wonderia is a MANGA style open-world sandbox for 1-8 players. Unique blend of sci-fi life-sim and dungeon exploration. Transform into alien adorably quirky creatures, craft, farm, fight, recruit space travellers, and build your cosmic adventure!

name: Normal Person
description: Normal Person is a single player horror, first person Visual Novel where your choices matter! Will you be able to escape or will you be stuck in a limbo with the man who claims to be a "Normal person"

name: Paradigm Island
description: Paradigm Island is a Narrative RPG where everyday surrealism meets dry wit. Figure out what kind of person you will be, piece together a perplexing mystery by getting to know the people you meet on the way using the skills of your liking, whilst trying not to get lost in your own psyche.

name: The Great Hero
description: Roguelike Deckbuilder Card Game. Merge skills to create higher-value skills, use skills to form Ultimates to cause damage! Use skills to restrain enemy skills and cause damage! Defeat increasingly stronger enemys and become The Great Hero.

name: Sandustry
description: Sandustry is a mining and automation game with sand physics. Explore a destructible world, digging and demolishing. Build a sand-processing factory and expand your logistics network. Delve deeper into the mines, unlock new technologies, and discover an ancient civilization's secrets.

name: Leader of the Pack
description: Nature, in her untamed stage, is savage and unrelenting. Survive the nature as long as you can as a wolf. Hunt, form a pack, protect your territory and do whatever necessary to survive. Also, beware as there is a new threat; human element. Will you thrive or wither away in your environment?

name: Facing Zombie,and 4 Walls
description: After the normal Apocalypse,Lucas decided to live in a room,instead of Going outside.When he open his door,random Zombies will come inside.They might bring Lucas some foo to Eat.Let’s see how long he’ll survive,without Friends.

name: Silly Scribbles
description: Become the owner of your own art business! Draw the images requested by a colorful cast of characters and make a name for yourself! Discover the city, make unusual friends and shape how the story unfolds! You can even play with a tablet or touchscreen!

name: Mutants Of Mist
description: A 1-4 player survival horror game where you collect evidence while trying to escape a strange mist. With the mist surrounding you, and mutants hunting you, will you survive with the evidence you have, or fall victim to the mist yourself?

name: Poop Prince
description: Embark on an epic adventure as a hero blessed with the unique power of infinite pooping. Navigate through a captivating blend of action-platformer, metroidvania, and puzzles in a charming hand-drawn 2D world. Unleash your heroic prowess in this quirky and entertaining game!

name: Mazinator
description: Earth, once verdant and teeming with life, now lies in ruin, its surface scarred by the devastating impact of a rogue comet. MythicMinds AI emerges as the unlikely harbinger of salvation. With humanity's future hanging in the balance, it has converged to conceive a daring solution: Mazinator.

name: Silent Weapons for Quiet Wars
description: Global conspiracies vie for absolute power in this espionage strategy game inspired by the conspiracy culture of the 1990's. Infiltrate governments, undermine civil rights, and foment wars in your campaign to establish a New World Order.

name: Merry Bear
description: A charming 2D platformer where you traverse through themed lands of giant fruit, TV dinners, spooky dollhouses, and your cozy, new A-frame cabin. Help Merry Bear find her mascot neighbors (and maybe some chic furniture) in a delightful, hand-drawn world influenced by mid-century illustration.

name: Seven Trials of Magic
description: A single player action RPG where you take the role of an apprentice witch. Explore the world, learn how to master magic, build your character and prepare for the Seven Trials of Magic.

name: Night of the Slayers
description: Night of the Slayers is a 5v2 first-person survival co-op horror game in which hunters can collaborate as effectively as the survivors. Escape with your friends without becoming prey, or scour the town with your pickup and hunt the survivors.

name: Quest Machina
description: Quest Machina is a single-player game that uses generative AI to create a unique adventure on each playthrough. Create your character, add prompts to influence the generation, and explore a world made just for you.

name: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey
description: This is an action game where you explore ruins buried in the forest with Ethnic BGM. Kijino, a cat-eared adventurer with two tails (Nekomata), goes on a journey around the ISEKIZIMA (Ruins Island of dreams and romance : as it was written in the tourist brochure).

name: Infinity Golf
description: Embark on an extraordinary golf adventure across the cosmos with "Alun's Game - Infinite Golf." Designed for endless exploration, this game offers a unique blend of challenging golf and strategic gameplay set in ever-changing planetary landscapes.

name: Stranded On An Island
description: You play as a survivor in a group of shipwrecked people on a desert island, you will have to survive and adapt to the wild life. Survive Collect Hunting and fishing Fights Explore Build, Manufacture Socialize Live your story Maybe you can find a way to escape this cursed island!

name: Mowed
description: Mowed is a 3D platformer that takes you on a journey through various games and environments with one goal in mind: Mow everything you can as fast as you can. You Are a mower-mage controlling a disemobied magical mower, and it's up to you to keep the grass short and beautiful.

name: Invaders, go home!
description: Real-time tactical strategy based on the realities of the modern war. Your country is under invasion. To help, you have volunteered as a tester for the new drone-based warfare system allowing you to guide and protect troops in the field by connecting to drones near by...

name: Parisyte
description: Run, warp, and fight (but mostly run) your way through the Paris catacombs with up to 4 players to loot the most valuable treasures left behind. But beware - there's a reason the catacombs have been closed to the public for many years.

name: Ultra Auto Gotchimon
description: Level up multitasking with digital pets on your screen. Immerse in auto-battles, fuse moves for unique tactics, and care for virtual pets while leveling them up. This unique creature collection auto-battler plays as an overlay – your perfect companion for work and entertainment!

name: Sacrament
description: Sacrament is an exciting cooperative adventure in the world of mythological dark fantasy inspired by the Yakut epic.

name: Necrophosis
description: Necrophosis is a first-person horror adventure that immerses you in a nightmarish-hellish world filled with bizarre forms and somber visuals. Explore eerie-surreal landscapes and unravel mysteries in this atmospheric journey through the macabre.

name: Gachi Defense
description: Gachi Defense is an incredible combination of fantasy and gachimuchi in the genre of survival with elements of tower defense. Hordes of slaves led by Darkholme invaded the world of simple boys, in order to enslave everyone. Your goal is to hold out as long as possible, crushing every enemy...

name: Palhalla
description: Palhalla is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter with dozens of crazy upgrades! Build your perfect power-up combo in this hectic top-down shooter. Turn the tides with a new power each time you lose - or overcome the odds and defeat your OP opponent!

name: King of Kung Fu
description: The world is in chaos, corpses everywhere, and rivers of blood! The burden of saving the world falls on your shoulders. On the basis of the idle RPG, this game also adds a gameplay similar to SLG, which can lead heroes to conquer cities and conquer the world.

name: Me and My Cat's Island
description: Eat onigiri and get along with everyone. The definitive onigiri action for me who wants to eat!This is a platformer game where you control me, whose state changes as I eat onigiri, and try to solve the mystery of the mysterious island.

name: LittleMouseHero
description: This is an open-world action role-playing game. In this world, you will play a little mouse and explore mysterious or dangerous scenes such as grasslands, forests, swamps, caves, etc., and discover wonderful things. creatures......

name: Nucleite
description: Awoken at night you listen to the screams of radiation victims and gangs rioting the streets for anything to survive, you have 2 options; escape or find the truth. Both are seemingly impossible and it us up to you to find out, alone or with friends.

name: Impromptu Trip
description: Beautiful tropical islands, rock climbing, driving, bungee jumping, sea riding... Are you ready to start this wonderful trip?

name: Versus
description: Versus offers a multiplayer battle experience with your friends. Customize your character with weapons, skins, and strategic modes. Improve your soldiers, earn rewards, and compete with players worldwide for victory!

name: Kraken Attack!
description: Wreak havoc as the mighty Kraken! Crush cities, swat pesky choppers, and unleash your tentacled fury in this fast-paced arcade smash-fest. Can you handle the chaos?

name: The Upper Downer Complex
description: The Upper Downer Complex is a Game where you are trapped inside your own dream. The Story unfolds around you, the truth is hidden beneath all the layer of dream worlds while you try to not get found by HIM.

name: Pixel Panic
description: Play as Celex Wallacin, and run, climb and celling fling your way through this awesome precision platformer you get to play in early development :D

name: Esoria
description: The Lord of the Underworld is back and the fate of Esoria is in your hands. Take on the role of one of the four heroes, collect powerful equipment, learn various skills and defeat Heres, the god of the underworld.

name: Smashfruit
description: Smashfruit is a lighthearted, 2D action-platformer. Play with up to 4 players and work together to gather collectibles and complete courses together!

name: Index: Purger
description: Step into the world of Index-0, and experience a thrill-fueled mercenary life like no other! With fast-paced, chaotic scenarios, you'll need to keep your wits about you to stay in the game. Make use of the equipment and perks at your disposal, and create your own unique style to control the chaos.

name: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage
description: TentaCat: Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit action platformer where you play as Aqua, a TentaCat separated from his birthplace on a secluded island and wants to find his own kind. Journey through 14 levels, collecting items and power-ups, fighting bosses and unraveling mysteries of the TentaCats.

name: Punk Juice
description: Join a band with two crass, potty-mouthed punks, Ricki and Max. Curate your style, endure the trials and tribulations of public transit, and play dead-end gigs! Go on mediocre dates, thrift with your besties, buy overpriced coffee, and complain about rent in this Seattle-inspired grungy city.

name: Urban Forest
description: Urban Forest is a city building deckbuilder. Use different cards to build up your city to gain support to win the mayor election.

name: DreaMon World
description: DreaMon World is a modern virtual pet, RPG, adventure. Enter a realm filled with mysterious creatures called DreaMon. Nurture, train, and evolve your very own DreaMon friend, all while embarking on a journey to find your way home!

name: Seers of Ages Past 1: The Harbinger of Mah
description: Seers of Ages Past 1: The Harbinger of Mah is a third-person, open-world Action RPG that tells the story of the summoner Tarbeard, the first Seer, who battles fierce and wondrous creatures with his minions on an epic fantasy adventure across the savage swampland of Yvermist.

name: La Boîte à Bidules de l'Oncle Ernest
description: La Boite à Bidule is an adventure game featuring a wide range of mini-games, based on reflexion, observation, dexterity and celerity. The entire story takes place in some kind of magical box created by Uncle Albert, containing living and talking toys. It's a game produced by Éric Viennot and developed by Lexis Numérique. Released in 2002, it's the first entry in a spin-off series derived from Uncle Albert's Adventures, aimed at a young demography of around 5 to 8 years old.

name: Blink Blonk
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Depart
description: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror prototype where you play as a 16-year-old boy experiencing his first long train ride. You can interact with strangers on the train, play games, and do routine things that people do during train trips.

name: DURT
description: Dig into this block-based puzzle game where you must master the elements of the subterranean world to rescue the miners trapped within. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the rescue becomes.

name: The Mom
description: This game puts you in the shoes of a dedicated mother uses her magical powers, your mission is to care for your home and children by cooking, cleaning, and caring, ensuring their needs are met and their happiness is preserved, But don’t forget the mother! this will be your double challenge!

name: Something Something Spaceship
description: Explore a malfunctioning spaceship and retrieve the items needed to fix it, while avoiding a colourful cast of enemies. An isometric platform puzzler inspired by games from the 8-bit era.

name: Rabbit and Turtle
description: A 3D action game where you control a turtle, use magic and items on the field, and aim to reach the goal before the rabbit does.

name: Treasure Hunter for Pico
description: Treasure Hunter for Pico is a game exclusively for Pico VR headset users.

name: Sleepless
description: A horror game set in an abandoned bunker in Russia, inspired by "The Russian Sleep Experiment." Players must collect important papers from past experiments, but the bunker is difficult to navigate with locked corridors, no electricity, and a constant feeling of being watched.

name: Run Away
description: Run Away: Build, Dodge, Collect!  Dive into the zany world of "Run Away," where block platforms, portal-hopping, and bull-dodging collide! Choose from adorable characters, build your way to victory, and face off against charging bulls. Ready for a hilarious adventure? Let the chaos begin!

name: Healed To Death
description: Healed To Death is a Healer Rogue-Like Action RPG. Play as the healer in a party of adventures and slay undead hordes while keeping your allies alive.

name: Long Trip
description: Long Trip is an action role-playing VR game set in a fantasy world where you can ride mounts, recruit warriors, tame pets, hunt, gather, cook, craft weapons, obtain magic abilities, and even summon ancient mechs or dragons to aid you in battles against bosses.
